activities: Select Personnel Investigations provides pre-employment background investigations to corporations worldwide.  We use applicant's personal information in our efforts to provide verification services to employers across the country.  We make contact regarding education, employment, criminal, references, licensing requirements, and financial and motor vehicle histories.
privacyprograms: The owner of Select Personnel Investigations is the Chair of the ASIS International - Privacy and Personnel Information Management Council.  She is also the Co-Chair of the Committe for Employment Screening Guidelines which has been working on the Guidelines to be distrbuted worldwide to the 70K members of ASIS and SHRM.
recoursemech: We have a dispute resolution program that all of our staff are trained.  We also require (mandatory) a training session with every new client to ensure they meet and follow the dispute resolution policy when there is a discrepancy of information.  EU Data Protection Authorities.
